*Drazom comes walking by and see's Mantella with some other Preds. He conve=
rts to robot mode and runs up to Mantella. Mantella's optics widen and she =
slaps her forehead* Drazom: I was wondering where you went, love. Mantella:=
 GET OUT OF HERE! Drazom: I know you don't like me but maybe if we spend so=
me time together we can get to know each other. Mantella: ARE THAT BRAINLES=
S!? Drazom: One chance? Mantella: NO! Drazom: A half of one? Mantella: NO! =
GET OUT OF HERE! YOU JUST DON'T GET DO YOU?! Drazom: Yes....I do......but y=
ou won't give me even one chance. Why? Mantella: I already told you why. Dr=
azom: Just one more ch- *Drazom is cut off as Mantella slaps him across the=
 face* *Drazom hovers and flies away* Mantella: Megatron, I know more troop=
s are importent but...it's either Drazom or me. Who is going? Because, I ju=
st can't take it. So, who do you vote goes?
